public class YouScopeClient
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Main frame of GUI to control the execution of measurements on the microscope.

Moritz Lang

                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Starts and runs the client.

quitClient

public void quitClient()
Tries to quit the client. The user is asked if the client should be really quit.

addClientFinishListener

public void addClientFinishListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
Adds a listener which gets notified if the server finished execution. The listener than e.g. can call System.exit(0).

Parameters:
listener - The listener which should be added.

removeClientFinishListener

public void removeClientFinishListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
Removes a previously added listener.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to be removed.
